title: Authors and Citation
text: Flavio Leccese. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Leccese F (2024). euroleaguer: 'Euroleague basketball API' R Client. R package version 0.1.0, https://flavioleccese92.github.io/euroleaguer/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {euroleaguer: 'Euroleague basketball API' R Client},   author = {Flavio Leccese},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://flavioleccese92.github.io/euroleaguer/}, }

title: Euroleague basketball API R Client
text: euroleaguer provides easy way retrieve data EuroLeague EuroCup API R. un-official API wrapper recommend follow usual rules conduct dealing open API calls.

title: Euroleague basketball API R Client
text: get current development version GitHub:

title: Get competition ahead-behind standings — getCompetitionAheadBehind
text: season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023) round value round. integer value

title: Get competition ahead-behind standings — getCompetitionAheadBehind
text: Returns summary tibble ahead-behind chosen competition round Reference webpage: Competition

title: Get competition ahead-behind standings — getCompetitionAheadBehind
code: getCompetitionAheadBehind(season_code = c("E2023", "E2022"), round = 1) #> # A tibble: 36 × 26 #>    SeasonCode Round Position PositionChange GamesPlayed GamesWon GamesLost #>    <chr>      <dbl>    <int> <chr>                <int>    <int>     <int> #>  1 E2023          1        1 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  2 E2023          1        2 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  3 E2023          1        3 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  4 E2023          1        4 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  5 E2023          1        5 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  6 E2023          1        6 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  7 E2023          1        7 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  8 E2023          1        8 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  9 E2023          1        9 Equal                    1        1         0 #> 10 E2023          1       10 Equal                    1        0         1 #> # ℹ 26 more rows #> # ℹ 19 more variables: Qualified <lgl>, WinsPercentage <chr>, TeamCode <chr>, #> #   TeamName <chr>, TeamAbbreviatedName <chr>, TeamEditorialName <chr>, #> #   TeamTvCode <chr>, TeamIsVirtual <lgl>, TeamImagesCrest <chr>, #> #   Quater1Ahead <chr>, Quater1Behind <chr>, Quater1Tied <chr>, #> #   Half1Ahead <chr>, Half1Behind <chr>, Half1Tied <chr>, Quater3Ahead <chr>, #> #   Quater3Behind <chr>, Quater3Tied <chr>, GroupName <chr>

title: Get competition calendar standings — getCompetitionCalendar
text: season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023) round value round. integer value

title: Get competition calendar standings — getCompetitionCalendar
text: Returns summary tibble ahead-behind chosen competition round Reference webpage: Competition

title: Get competition calendar standings — getCompetitionCalendar
code: getCompetitionCalendar(season_code = c("E2023", "E2022"), round = 1) #> # A tibble: 36 × 17 #>    SeasonCode Round Position PositionChange GamesPlayed GamesWon GamesLost #>    <chr>      <dbl>    <int> <chr>                <int>    <int>     <int> #>  1 E2023          1        1 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  2 E2023          1        2 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  3 E2023          1        3 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  4 E2023          1        4 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  5 E2023          1        5 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  6 E2023          1        6 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  7 E2023          1        7 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  8 E2023          1        8 Equal                    1        1         0 #>  9 E2023          1        9 Equal                    1        1         0 #> 10 E2023          1       10 Equal                    1        0         1 #> # ℹ 26 more rows #> # ℹ 10 more variables: Qualified <lgl>, GroupName <chr>, TeamCode <chr>, #> #   TeamName <chr>, TeamAbbreviatedName <chr>, TeamEditorialName <chr>, #> #   TeamTvCode <chr>, TeamIsVirtual <lgl>, TeamImagesCrest <chr>, #> #   Streaks <list>

title: Get competition games — getCompetitionGames
text: season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023) round value round. integer value phase_type code competition phase (RS regular season, PO playoffs FF final four). Default .

title: Get competition games — getCompetitionGames
text: Returns summary tibble games chosen competitions

title: Get competition games — getCompetitionGames
code: getCompetitionGames(season_code = "E2023", round = 1:5) #> # A tibble: 45 × 74 #>    SeasonCode Round PhaseType Id          Code SeasonName SeasonAlias SeasonYear #>    <chr>      <int> <chr>     <chr>      <int> <chr>      <chr>            <int> #>  1 E2023          1 ALL       7f6a4bb1-…     9 EuroLeagu… 2023-24           2023 #>  2 E2023          1 ALL       9a5a317e-…     8 EuroLeagu… 2023-24           2023 #>  3 E2023          1 ALL       ca519f90-…     7 EuroLeagu… 2023-24           2023 #>  4 E2023          1 ALL       afd17e40-…     6 EuroLeagu… 2023-24           2023 #>  5 E2023          1 ALL       0f3e0553-…     5 EuroLeagu… 2023-24           2023 #>  6 E2023          1 ALL       68ea1f2d-…     3 EuroLeagu… 2023-24           2023 #>  7 E2023          1 ALL       57eeec3d-…     2 EuroLeagu… 2023-24           2023 #>  8 E2023          1 ALL       cde88ac2-…     4 EuroLeagu… 2023-24           2023 #>  9 E2023          1 ALL       9e5b16f6-…     1 EuroLeagu… 2023-24           2023 #> 10 E2023          2 ALL       647cbabf-…    12 EuroLeagu… 2023-24           2023 #> # ℹ 35 more rows #> # ℹ 66 more variables: CompetitionCode <chr>, CompetitionName <chr>, #> #   GroupId <chr>, GroupName <chr>, GroupOrder <int>, PhaseTypeCode <chr>, #> #   PhaseTypeName <chr>, PhaseTypeAlias <chr>, PhaseTypeIsGroupPhase <lgl>, #> #   RoundRound <int>, RoundName <chr>, RoundAlias <chr>, Date <chr>, #> #   Status <chr>, Minute <chr>, RemainingTime <chr>, Quarter <lgl>, #> #   QuarterMinute <lgl>, HomeCode <chr>, HomeName <chr>, …

title: Get competition history — getCompetitionHistory
text: competition_code code competition. Possible values E Euroleague U Eurocup)

title: Get competition history — getCompetitionHistory
text: Returns summary tibble history chosen competitions

title: Get competition margins standings — getCompetitionMargins
text: season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023) round value round. integer value

title: Get competition margins standings — getCompetitionMargins
text: Returns summary tibble standing margins chosen competition round Reference webpage: Competition

title: Get competition traditional standings — getCompetitionStandings
text: season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023) round value round. integer value

text: Returns summary tibble standings choseN competition round Reference webpage: Competition

text: season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023) round value round. integer value

text: Returns summary tibble streaks chosen competition round Reference webpage: Competition

title: Get game box-score — getGameBoxScore
text: game_code code game. integer value season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game box-score — getGameBoxScore
text: Returns list elements chosen games seasons Team. Name teams Coach. Name coaches EndOfQuarter. Team accumulated points quarter ByQuarter. Team points quarter PlayerStats. Statistics player game TeamStats. Aggregated statistics team game Reference webpage: BoxScore

title: Get game box-score — getGameBoxScore
code: getGameBoxScore(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1) #> $Team #> # A tibble: 4 × 3 #>   GameCode SeasonCode Team                               #>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>                              #> 1        1 E2023      CRVENA ZVEZDA MERIDIANBET BELGRADE #> 2        1 E2023      LDLC ASVEL VILLEURBANNE            #> 3        1 U2023      PROMETEY SLOBOZHANSKE              #> 4        1 U2023      VEOLIA TOWERS HAMBURG              #>  #> $Coach #> # A tibble: 4 × 3 #>   GameCode SeasonCode Coach             #>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>             #> 1        1 E2023      IVANOVIC, DUSKO   #> 2        1 E2023      PARKER, TJ        #> 3        1 U2023      GINZBURG, RONEN   #> 4        1 U2023      BARLOSCHKY, BENKA #>  #> $EndOfQuarter #> # A tibble: 4 × 7 #>   GameCode SeasonCode Team                   Quarter1 Quarter2 Quarter3 Quarter4 #>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>                     <int>    <int>    <int>    <int> #> 1        1 E2023      CRVENA ZVEZDA MERIDIA…       29       52       69       94 #> 2        1 E2023      LDLC ASVEL VILLEURBAN…       18       31       55       73 #> 3        1 U2023      PROMETEY SLOBOZHANSKE        35       54       78       97 #> 4        1 U2023      VEOLIA TOWERS HAMBURG        15       42       62       77 #>  #> $ByQuarter #> # title: Get game evolution — getGameEvolution
text: game_code code game. integer value season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game evolution — getGameEvolution
text: Returns list two elements chosen games seasons EvolutionSummary. Overall information minimum maximum difference scores teams Evolution. Minute minute points team Reference webpage: GraphicStats

title: Get game evolution — getGameEvolution
code: getGameEvolution(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1) #> $EvolutionSummary #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   GameCode SeasonCode MinuteMaxA MinuteMaxB ScoreMaxA ScoreMaxB #>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>      <chr>      <chr>     <chr>     #> 1        1 E2023      23         0          62 - 37   0 - 0     #> 2        1 U2023      11         0          38 - 15   0 - 0     #>  #> $Evolution #> # A tibble: 82 × 7 #>    GameCode SeasonCode Minute PointsTeamA PointsTeamB DiffTeamA DiffTeamB #>       <dbl> <chr>       <int>       <int>       <int>     <int>     <int> #>  1        1 E2023           0           3           2         1        NA #>  2        1 E2023           1           6           4         2        NA #>  3        1 E2023           2          12           6         6        NA #>  4        1 E2023           3          17           7        10        NA #>  5        1 E2023           4          19          10         9        NA #>  6        1 E2023           5          22          14         8        NA #>  7        1 E2023           6          24          14        10        NA #>  8        1 E2023           7          26          16        10        NA #>  9        1 E2023           8          29          16        13        NA #> 10        1 E2023           9          29          18        11        NA #> # ℹ 72 more rows #>

title: Get game header — getGameHeader
text: game_code code game. integer value season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game header — getGameHeader
text: Returns summary chosen games seasons

title: Get game header — getGameHeader
code: getGameHeader(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1) #> # A tibble: 2 × 46 #>   GameCode SeasonCode Live  Round Date       Hour   Stadium Capacity TeamA TeamB #>      <dbl> <chr>      <lgl> <chr> <chr>      <chr>  <chr>   <chr>    <chr> <chr> #> 1        1 E2023      FALSE 1     05/10/2023 "19:0… STARK … 18360    CRVE… LDLC… #> 2        1 U2023      FALSE 1     04/10/2023 "18:0… ARENA … 2022     PROM… VEOL… #> # ℹ 36 more variables: CodeTeamA <chr>, TVCodeA <chr>, CodeTeamB <chr>, #> #   TVCodeB <chr>, ImA <chr>, ImB <chr>, ScoreA <chr>, ScoreB <chr>, #> #   CoachA <chr>, CoachB <chr>, GameTime <chr>, RemainingPartialTime <chr>, #> #   Wid <chr>, Quarter <chr>, FoultsA <chr>, FoultsB <chr>, TimeoutsA <chr>, #> #   TimeoutsB <chr>, ScoreQuarter1A <int>, ScoreQuarter2A <int>, #> #   ScoreQuarter3A <int>, ScoreQuarter4A <int>, ScoreExtraTimeA <int>, #> #   ScoreQuarter1B <int>, ScoreQuarter2B <int>, ScoreQuarter3B <int>, …

title: Get game play-by-play — getGamePlayByPlay
text: game_code code game. integer value season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game play-by-play — getGamePlayByPlay
text: Returns list two elements chosen games seasons PlayByPlaySummary. Overall information games, teams involved status (live ) PlayByPlay. Detailed information games, particularly NumberOfPlay TypeOfPlay Reference webpage: PlayByPlay

title: Get game play-by-play — getGamePlayByPlay
code: getGamePlayByPlay(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1)$PlayByPlay #> # A tibble: 1,105 × 17 #>    GameCode SeasonCode Quarter  Type NumberOfPlay CodeTeam IdPlayer PlayType #>       <dbl> <chr>        <dbl> <int>        <int> <chr>    <chr>    <chr>    #>  1        1 E2023            1     0            2 NA       NA       BP       #>  2        1 E2023            1     0            3 ASV      NA       JB       #>  3        1 E2023            1     0            4 ASV      P004194  3FGA     #>  4        1 E2023            1     0            5 ASV      P012730  O        #>  5        1 E2023            1     0            6 ASV      P004194  2FGM     #>  6        1 E2023            1     0            7 RED      PLUO     3FGM     #>  7        1 E2023            1     0          249 RED      P012711  CM       #>  8        1 E2023            1     0          250 ASV      P004194  RV       #>  9        1 E2023            1     0            8 RED      P003479  AS       #> 10        1 E2023            1     0           10 ASV      P004194  2FGM     #> # ℹ 1,095 more rows #> # ℹ 9 more variables: Player <chr>, Team <chr>, Dorsal <chr>, Minute <int>, #> #   Markertime <chr>, PointsA <int>, PointsB <int>, Comment <lgl>, #> #   PlayInfo <chr>

title: Get game players — getGamePlayers
text: game_code code game. integer value team_code code team (examples ASV, MAD, ...) season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game players — getGamePlayers
text: Returns tibble players related information given game season

title: Get game players — getGamePlayers

title: Get game points — getGamePoints
text: game_code code game. integer value season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game points — getGamePoints
text: Returns scoring information player chosen games seasons (subset play--play data). particular: NumberOfPlay. Reference id action (useful join results getPlayByPlay) CoordX CoordY. Spatial coordinates shot Zone. Area court shot Reference webpage: PlayByPlay

title: Get game points — getGamePoints
code: getGamePoints(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1) #> # A tibble: 311 × 20 #>    GameCode SeasonCode TeamCode NumberOfPlay Player_ID Player   Action_ID Action #>       <dbl> <chr>      <chr>           <int> <chr>     <chr>    <chr>     <chr>  #>  1        1 E2023      ASV                 4 004194    LAUVERG… 3FGA      Misse… #>  2        1 E2023      ASV                 6 004194    LAUVERG… 2FGM      Two P… #>  3        1 E2023      RED                 7 LUO       LAZIC, … 3FGM      Three… #>  4        1 E2023      ASV                10 004194    LAUVERG… 2FGM      Two P… #>  5        1 E2023      RED                11 012711    SIMONOV… 3FGM      Three… #>  6        1 E2023      ASV                14 012080    LUWAWU-… 3FGA      Misse… #>  7        1 E2023      RED                18 011224    NAPIER,… 3FGM      Three… #>  8        1 E2023      ASV                19 012080    LUWAWU-… 2FGM      Two P… #>  9        1 E2023      RED                21 012711    SIMONOV… 3FGM      Three… #> 10        1 E2023      RED                26 006436    GIEDRAI… 2FGM      Two P… #> # ℹ 301 more rows #> # ℹ 12 more variables: Points <int>, CoordX <int>, CoordY <int>, Zone <chr>, #> #   Fastbreak <chr>, SecondChance <chr>, PointsOffTurnover <chr>, Minute <int>, #> #   Console <chr>, PointsA <int>, PointsB <int>, Utc <dttm>

title: Get game round — getGameRound
text: game_code code game. integer value season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023)

title: Get game round — getGameRound
text: Returns round value given game season

title: Get game round — getGameRound
code: getGameRound(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1) #> # A tibble: 2 × 3 #>   GameCode SeasonCode Value   #>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>   #> 1        1 E2023      ROUND 1 #> 2        1 U2023      ROUND 1

title: Get team — getTeam
text: team_code code team (examples ASV, MAD, ...) season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023)

title: Get team — getTeam
text: Returns summary information teams season Reference webpage: Team

title: Get team — getTeam

title: Get team stats — getTeamStats
text: team_code code team (examples ASV, MAD, ...) season_code code season (examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023) phase_type code competition phase (RS regular season, PO playoffs FF final four). Default .

title: Get team stats — getTeamStats
text: Returns list elements chosen teams seasons PlayerAccumulated. Total sum statistics player PlayerAveragePerGame. Average per game statistics player PlayerAveragePer40. Average per 40 minutes statistics player TeamAccumulated. Total sum statistics team TeamAveragePerGame. Average per game statistics teams Reference webpage: Team

title: Get team stats — getTeamStats
